long_description: The Skullcandy Fix earbuds with microphone serve sweet sound to your ears in comfort and style while staying firmly in place in your ears, even while exercising or enjoying other vigorous activities. Innovative "hook" design helps ensure a secure fit in your ears. Mic 3+ remote controls your iOS with a three-button mic/remote (volume, track, play/pause, take calls). Supreme sound lets you experience your music the way it was meant to be heard. Silicone gel tips come in interchangeable sizes for a custom fit. The Skullcandy Fix earbuds come with a travel case that stores your earbuds in protective style.
short_description: The Skullcandy Fix earbuds with microphone serve sweet sound to your ears in comfort and style while staying firmly in place in your ears, even while exercising or enjoying other vigorous activities.
